name: Foododo
description:
Look at this cute, freshly hatched Dodo. Feed him some tasty fruit and let him grow big and strong!
Huh, what's this on the right you ask? Oh, nothing, don't worry about it..

How To Play:

The Dodo will walk towards the Grinder by himself. For the Connect-3, you click on a cluster consisting of at least 3 tiles of the same Seasoning. It will dissapear and apply on the fruit underneath. Once your fruit is seasoned the way you want, press a number key (1-5), to release is in the corresponding tube. If the Dodo really likes the food you made, he might even turn around for it.
